title: basexone
author: basexone
content: I'm excited to share the news of the launch of our new cryptocurrency exchange service - basex.one.Here's a brief overview of what sets us apart:1. Multiple Cryptocurrency Support. We offer an extensive list of popular coins and tokens.2. Cross-direction Trades. Every coin we offer can be exchanged for any other in any available network.3. Universal Exchanges. Use our platform as a bridge between different blockchains, ensuring affordable and fast transactions.4. Transparent Fees. No hidden charges. You get exactly the amount you enter in the "Receive" field.5 .Intuitive and Simple. Even someone new to the world of cryptocurrency can easily navigate our platform.6. Trading Efficiency. Instant order execution, low latency, and high throughput.7. Top-notch Security. We take all necessary measures to protect our users' assets, using cutting-edge security technologies and storing funds in cold wallets.8.Custom Requests. If you can't find the cryptocurrency you're looking for on our website, just message us on Telegram. Within 30 minutes, we'll make the coin you choose available for exchange!Our goal is to create a user-friendly, easy-to-use, and secure service for all cryptocurrency enthusiasts. Your feedback and opinions are invaluable to us as we continuously strive to improve.We invite everyone to join, try out our service, and share your experience!Best regards,The basex.one Team.

comments.author: Rikafip
comments.body: Quote from: rat03gopoh on October 06, 2023, 03:10:31 PMI see there is no maximum exchangeable amount there. Do you offer an unlimited amount of exchanges? If true, who is the liquidity provider?I don't know why you can't see it, but I can see the maximum amount when I choose cryptocurrency. For example, BTC is set at 54, ETH 810 etc. Their website looks like something that was made in the 1990s and overall there's very little info about them, which makes me very suspicious of all of this.

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: The site only provides an HTTP connection without using TLS to encrypt HTTP requests and responses aka HTTPS, and therefore it is difficult to trust that the development team has enough experience to ensure that the platform’s funds are safe.The UI is not responsive and therefore it is difficult to perform clicks either on a phone or  desktop.All the features are available on most platforms, so it is difficult to compete with them.Transfer fees are not the best, so you do not have any significant advantages.

comments.author: stompix
comments.body: Quote from: rat03gopoh on October 06, 2023, 03:10:31 PMQuote5. Deny the Client's request to withdraw funds into a third-party account without providing a reason;https://basex.one/aml.phpThis is the most annoying policy for any exchange.QuoteEach transaction is attributed a risk factor, signifying the extent of 'contamination' of the funds. This risk factor is capped at a maximum of 25%.After psn.net claimed that because of a stupid bot score funds transferred from crypto.com wallet are suspicious I would stay away from any of those services that even try to calculate a risk score.QuoteThe refund of funds is effectuated after a comprehensive investigation conducted by the Service's Security Department, which may encompass a meticulous verification of the sender. The refund is implemented after deducting a commission fee up to 7% of the transaction amount, this is done to cover the labor expenses associated with processing the application and arranging the fund's reimbursement.7% tax on a hunch the funds are "risky" and the user has no right to oppose, lol.You do realize that if you followed AML regulation you would have had to seize the money and inform your local authority about this then after a police inquiry turn the funds to them to return them to the user?This is just abuse and trying to scam so poor user who can't justify with 100 pages of docs proof his $100 earned from a casino!

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: Quote from: CCMS on October 09, 2023, 02:20:52 PMIsn't Binance enough for all kinds of exchanges ?No, some instant exchanges are still gaining popularity due to the speed of the transfer and the absence of the need to create an account and KYC with a fee that is often ~1-3 USD, and therefore it is a compromise solution for those who want to exchange amounts less than $1000 and do not want to provide their data to binance.There are also some coins that are not listed on binance or have high withdrawal fees.
